snippet.title: Iron Rift: Demo Gameplay
snippet.description:
Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/xenomon-rpg-game/xenomon-open-world-monster-fighting-rpg-0
Discord: https://discord.gg/3HZKNuxH8N

#monstertaming #creaturecollector #palworld #pokemon #monsterhunter #digimon

The world was never the same after the Rift. One night, an explosion of unknown energy tore through reality, unleashing terrifying and powerful creatures into the world. Cities fell, chaos reigned, and humanity struggled to survive. To fight back, scientists developed Riftguns, weapons capable of capturing and digitizing these creatures for control. While some used them to restore balance, others saw an opportunity for power.

Among the lawless survivors is Lenz, a battle-hardened fighter with nothing to lose. Once a street criminal, now a survivor in a world ruled by monsters and warlords, Lenz doesn’t care about justice—only survival. But after he crosses paths with one of the unknown creatures and forms an uneasy alliance, he’s dragged into a brutal war against the Ruthless 8—a group of warlords who control powerful creatures and rule their territories.
